actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Rockefeller with amendments. With written report No. 111-65.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 148.

official_title: A bill to expand the boundaries of the Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary and Underwater Preserve, and for other purposes.
short_title: Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary and Underwater Preserve Boundary Modification Act

summary.text: Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary and Underwater Preserve Boundary Modification Act - Expands, notwithstanding any provision of law or regulation, the boundaries of the Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary and Underwater Preserve in Lake Huron.

titles.title: Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary and Underwater Preserve Boundary Modification Act
Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary and Underwater Preserve Boundary Modification Act
A bill to expand the boundaries of the Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary and Underwater Preserve, and for other purposes.
